SELECT TASKID, a.PROCESSNAME, a.INCIDENT, b.SUMMARY, b.INITIATOR, a.STEPLABEL, a.TASKUSER, a.ASSIGNEDTOUSER, a.STATUS, a.SUBSTATUS, a.STARTTIME, a.ENDTIME, a.STEPID ,b.STARTTIME OVERDUETIME ,b.STATUS as PROCESSSTATUS ,$SERVERNAME$ as SERVERNAME ,RTRIM(REPLACE(b.INITIATOR,'HONFEI/','')) RequestorDate FROM TASKS a with(nolock) INNER JOIN INCIDENTS b with(nolock) ON a.PROCESSNAME = b.PROCESSNAME AND a.INCIDENT = b.INCIDENT WHERE a.STATUS=1 AND a.ASSIGNEDTOUSER=$ASSIGNEDTOUSER$
a.STARTTIME BETWEEN #STARTTIME# AND #ENDTIME#
$filter$ ORDER BY $Sort$

SELECT count(1) FROM TASKS a with(nolock) INNER JOIN INCIDENTS b with(nolock) ON a.PROCESSNAME = b.PROCESSNAME AND a.INCIDENT = b.INCIDENT WHERE a.STATUS=1 AND a.ASSIGNEDTOUSER=$ASSIGNEDTOUSER$
a.STARTTIME BETWEEN #STARTTIME# AND #ENDTIME#
$filter$

SELECT TASKID, a.PROCESSNAME, a.INCIDENT, b.SUMMARY, b.INITIATOR, a.STEPLABEL, a.TASKUSER, a.STATUS, a.SUBSTATUS, a.ENDTIME, a.STEPID, a.OVERDUETIME ,b.STATUS as PROCESSSTATUS, b.STARTTIME ,$SERVERNAME$ as SERVERNAME FROM TASKS a with(nolock) INNER JOIN INCIDENTS b with(nolock) ON a.PROCESSNAME = b.PROCESSNAME AND a.INCIDENT = b.INCIDENT INNER JOIN PROCESSSTEPS c with(nolock) ON a.PROCESSNAME=c.PROCESSNAME and a.PROCESSVERSION=c.PROCESSVERSION and a.STEPID=c.STEPID AND c.STEPTYPE=2
WHERE 1=1 AND (INITIATOR=$ASSIGNEDTOUSER$ )
b.STARTTIME BETWEEN #STARTTIME# AND #ENDTIME#
$filter$ ORDER BY $Sort$

SELECT count(1) FROM TASKS a with(nolock) INNER JOIN INCIDENTS b with(nolock) ON a.PROCESSNAME = b.PROCESSNAME AND a.INCIDENT = b.INCIDENT INNER JOIN PROCESSSTEPS c with(nolock) ON a.PROCESSNAME=c.PROCESSNAME and a.PROCESSVERSION=c.PROCESSVERSION and a.STEPID=c.STEPID AND c.STEPTYPE=2
WHERE 1=1 AND (ASSIGNEDTOUSER=$ASSIGNEDTOUSER$ )
a.STARTTIME BETWEEN #STARTTIME# AND #ENDTIME#
$filter$

SELECT TASKID, a.PROCESSNAME, a.INCIDENT, b.SUMMARY, b.INITIATOR, a.STEPLABEL, a.TASKUSER, a.ASSIGNEDTOUSER, a.STATUS, a.SUBSTATUS, b.STARTTIME, a.ENDTIME, a.STEPID, a.OVERDUETIME ,b.STATUS as PROCESSSTATUS ,$SERVERNAME$ as SERVERNAME FROM TASKS a with(nolock) INNER JOIN INCIDENTS b with(nolock) ON a.PROCESSNAME = b.PROCESSNAME AND a.INCIDENT = b.INCIDENT INNER JOIN PROCESSSTEPS c with(nolock) ON a.PROCESSNAME=c.PROCESSNAME and a.PROCESSVERSION=c.PROCESSVERSION and a.STEPID=c.STEPID WHERE c.STEPTYPE=4 AND a.STATUS in (3,4,7) AND ASSIGNEDTOUSER=$ASSIGNEDTOUSER$
a.STARTTIME BETWEEN #STARTTIME# AND #ENDTIME#
$filter$ ORDER BY $Sort$

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TASKS a with(nolock) INNER JOIN INCIDENTS b with(nolock) ON a.PROCESSNAME = b.PROCESSNAME AND a.INCIDENT = b.INCIDENT INNER JOIN PROCESSSTEPS c with(nolock) ON a.PROCESSNAME=c.PROCESSNAME and a.PROCESSVERSION=c.PROCESSVERSION and a.STEPID=c.STEPID WHERE c.STEPTYPE=4 AND a.STATUS in (3,4,7) AND ASSIGNEDTOUSER=$ASSIGNEDTOUSER$
a.STARTTIME BETWEEN #STARTTIME# AND #ENDTIME#
$filter$

SELECT TASKID, a.PROCESSNAME, a.INCIDENT, a.STEPLABEL, a.TASKUSER, a.ASSIGNEDTOUSER, a.STATUS, a.SUBSTATUS, a.STARTTIME, a.ENDTIME, a.STEPID, a.OVERDUETIME ,isnull(b.Summary,'') as SUMMARY ,$SERVERNAME$ as SERVERNAME FROM TASKS a with(nolock) INNER JOIN incidents b with(nolock) on a.processname=b.processname and a.incident=b.incident WHERE taskID=#taskID#

SELECT INITIATEID as TASKID ,PROCESSNAME ,0 as INCIDENT ,'' as SUMMARY ,STEPLABEL ,'' as TASKUSER ,'' as ASSIGNEDTOUSER ,0 as STATUS ,0 as SUBSTAUTS FROM INITIATE with(nolock) WHERE INITIATEID=#taskID#
